thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice location and value
thread.title_full: Nice location and value - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: BigChrisR
title: Nice location and value
text: I work in the Westminster area sometimes and have stayed here a few times. Good value compared to Other hotels and comfortable rooms and places to eat. Staff have always been friendly. The only thing that lets it down for me is the lack of air conditioning. I couldn't stay here in summer unfortunately for that reason, but October to April it's a great choice.
